items.sentence: Tom was about thirty years old when he moved to Boston.
You may be forced to fight, whether you want to or not.
You should always wash new clothes before wearing them.
Tom and Mary looked into each other\'s eyes and kissed.
Tom and Mary never should\'ve tried traveling together.
I\'ve been trying to spend a little more time with Tom.
I\'ve got to find out who Tom gave that information to.
I\'ve heard that decaffeinated coffee may cause cancer.
I\'ve never seen a car this old in such good condition.
Tom has been in love with Mary since the seventh grade.
